author: Special Correspondent
text:
A senior Congress leader from West Bengal has written to party president Sonia Gandhi and vice-president Rahul Gandhi on the need for an electoral alliance with the Communist Party of India (Marxist) in the 2016 Assembly polls.

Omprakash Mishra, general secretary of the State unit, who is also member of All India Congress Committee (AICC), claims in the letter that such an understanding s would help overthrow the Trinamool Congress (TMC) and “usher in Congress-Left Front government in West Bengal”.

Mr Mishra has attached a document containing projections for the Assembly polls in 2016 where the Congress and Left Front are winning more seats than the TMC.
title: Congress leader writes to Sonia on poll alliance
